text: This should be reported upstream to `pylint-mccabe`. That method emitted DeprecationWarnings for a couple of releases now and it was scheduled to be removed in 1.6.
title: nan

text:
I ran into the same issue, and found that [pylint ships with a design checker which implements McCabe complexity testing](https://pylint.readthedocs.io/en/latest/technical_reference/extensions.html#design-checker).

As pylint-mccabe hasn't been updated in five years, you should probably move to this extension.

I just added the following to .pylintrc:

    [MASTER]
    load-plugins=pylint.extensions.mccabe
title: nan
